title: GitHub Uncovers New ruby-saml Vulnerabilities Allowing Account Takeover Attacks
description: Two high-severity security flaws have been disclosed in the open-source ruby-saml library that could allow malicious actors to bypass Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) authentication protections.
